summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingBenefit's Silky-Soft Powder Blush features shades bursting with color! These silky-soft powder blushes feel ultra-fine and weightless. They're buildable, blendable, and oh so beautiful. Sweep effortlessly onto cheeks for a soft-focus, airbrushed effect.
details: DetailsBenefitsBrighteningMatte finishBuildableSmudge-proofHumidity-proofKey IngredientsFreshwater Pearl & synthetic Sapphire give a luminous, light-reflecting glow, and help skin look smooth and radiantItem 2595623How To UseSwirl brush in blush and sweep onto cheeks. Blend and build as desired on bare face or over makeup.IngredientsButterfly: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Zinc Stearate, Mica, Lauryl Dimethicone, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Alumina, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dehydroacetic Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Pearl Powder, Stearic Acid, Laureth-4, Aqua (Water), Tin Oxide, Tocopherol. May Contain: Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15985 (Yellow 6 Lake), Ci 15850 (Red 7 Lake). NÂ° 16139.Disclaimer: Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: Smaller Size of a Great Blush
reviews.comments: I needed a travel sized blush for trips and this one is perfect.  There are many shades available, which means it is easy to find the right one for your skin or mood.  The product does not come with an applicator, however I already had a travel sized brush, so it was not an issue for me.  Already taken it on two trips and so good so far.  I'm a bit concerned that since the package is cardboard, it might not last as long as a plastic one.  I do like that it is recyclable, however.

reviews.headline: Benefit blush
reviews.comments: Unfortunately Benefit blush was broken when I opened the box.

reviews.headline: Gorgeous pink color
reviews.comments: The color on this gives you the kiss of beautiful pink cheeks they look very natural and the color is beautiful. I am on my third one. I have hit pan on all of them.

reviews.headline: beautiful color
reviews.comments: fantastic color

reviews.headline: Yes, would buy again
reviews.comments: I was actually quite impressed with this powder blush. It will last a very long time, and goes on very well. Lasts all day !

reviews.headline: Best Blush
reviews.comments: When I first pick up this blush I thought it would be another blush to add to my collection. However I was completely shocked on how good this product looks on my face and it shames every other blush that I have. You can easily build up how pigmented you want the blush and it looks flawless on the skin.

reviews.headline: Amazing Blush!
reviews.comments: I LOVE this blush. I love the shade shellie because it makes my skin look naturally sun-kissed. The blush is very pigmented and the formula feels great on the skin. I was hesitant on buying this because I normally go for cheaper products, but this product was worth the price! I will only be buying this brand of blush from now on!

reviews.headline: SO LIGHT
reviews.comments: i love it soooo sooo much! it is so light but has a great color even for my skin which is darker. amazing and would buy in different shades! go buy RIGHT NOW!

reviews.headline: Blush
reviews.comments: Love this shade

reviews.headline: Breaks in the box
reviews.comments: I bought this blush twice. The first time it was broken already in the box when I opened it. I returned it for a new one and that one broke 2 days later after one use. it doesn't stay put together in the box and it is way too expensive to be breaking so easily. I am quite disappointed as it's a beautiful blush and I love the color and application

reviews.headline: I will definitely buy this product again!
reviews.comments: Beautiful consistency and color!

reviews.headline: Very nice color
reviews.comments: I really like the Shellie color blush, but unfortunately I received it in pieces. The packaging really needs to improve.

reviews.headline: Definitely will be using this product for years
reviews.comments: This is the best blush I've used in years. A powder crÃ¨me, it goes on smooth and flawless. Love it, you won't be disappointed if you try.

reviews.headline: Brakes Easily
reviews.comments: Color is nice and this blush blends well but they crack so easily. Ordered two and they both cracked within the first month. Tried to put them back by spraying alochol on them and pressing them back into the box but the consistency is weird. Would not purchase again for the price.

reviews.headline: Broke within a month
reviews.comments: Great color but it broke into pieces within a month. I never dropped it.

reviews.headline: Nothing like the Dallas blush
reviews.comments: So love the Dallas Blush and was totally bummed when it was discontinued. Was at the brow bar and I asked what do they have that is similar to Dallas. Welp, I was suggested this one. Don't get me wrong it's nice just not my style. Was totes disappointed.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Love this!

reviews.headline: New Fave
reviews.comments:
Bought this on an impulsive whim and so glad I did. I love it!  I usually wear Bare Minerals. I love the nearly plastic free packaging. Its silky and smooth and blends so easily. Great natural
Color. Lasts all day.

reviews.headline: Love the eyeshadow
reviews.comments: This is my 2nd purchase of the Dandelion blush. I love the light color. Perfect for spring/summer. The reason I took one Star off is that I'm disappointed since the first one I bought when you open it, it had a mirror and a mini brush, this did not. I'm happy I still have the first one to use. Disappointed that Benefit is cutting corners.

media.headline: The best blush I've ever bought

faceoff_positive.comments:
I was skeptical about paying this much for a blush, but the color and smell were so pretty, and I was trying to upgrade my cosmetic purchases from the cheap stuff that was wrecking my skin, so I took the plunge. I am beyond glad that I did! Dandelion is the most gorgeous color; it looks good on every skin tone I've tested it on, from my own very pale complexion to my best friend's lovely deep chocolate brown skin. It's beautifully subtle with one swipe and gives you a sweet apple-cheeked glow with two or three.

Also, the gorgeous thing about Benefit is that, while their products will cost more than what you'll find at the local big box, a little of anything Benefit makes goes a long way. I've had this box of Dandelion for well over a year, and I use it every single day. It still looks just as beautiful, it still smells gorgeous and fresh, and I can't even begin to imagine when it will start to run out.

Also, a note about the brush it comes with: I always tossed the brushes that came with my cheap blushes. They made the color look streaky and were just awful. And I very nearly tossed the brush that came with Dandelion, but I decided to test it first. Boy, am I glad I did! It's exactly the right width for swiping over cheeks, nose, chin, and forehead. Also, the bristles are super-soft. So give it a go!

Dandelion was my first Benefit purchase, but it wasn't my last. This was the product that got me to ditch my old makeup for good in favor of Benefit's absolutely wonderful line. A must-have for any makeup bag!
faceoff_positive.headline: An Indispensable Part of My Daily Routine

faceoff_negative.comments: I have been buying Benefit's boxed powders for years. I especially love the dandelion because it's light, blends well and I can wear it in the Winter when I'm pale as well as the Summer when I get tan. One reason I can justify spending the money on it is because in the past it has lasted me a long time, BUT... I was very disappointed when I ordered a new box only to see how much product is now being shorted, while charging the same price (or more). My old box Net wt was .42oz, now down to .25oz... really? I'm not sure I feel so good about spending that much money and getting almost half the product.
faceoff_negative.headline: Love the product, but lost it's value
